title: I really want to buy that Kog'maw tshirt.
body: Does it come in purple? Blue is a gross colour.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Iy4Q2AyI,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-19T04:54:48.617+0000)
>
> Blue is a gross colour.

No.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Iy4Q2AyI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-19T10:16:09.271+0000)
>
> No.

Well the blue colour they offer, it it was light blue I'd be all over that.
